protective_factors: Strong connection/sense of responsibility toward children and husband ('I couldn't do that to them')
Expresses willingness to engage in treatment changes (medication and behavioral)
Explicit denial of intent and plan
risk_factors: Current severe depressive symptoms (*F33.1*) with functional impairment (missing work)
Significant feelings of guilt/hopelessness ('I'm a failure')
clinical_actions: Increase frequency of follow-up for next 2 weeks due to medication change and passive ideation
Monitor closely for any shift from passive to active ideation following dose increase
Review and document an appropriate safety plan focused on reducing isolation and improving sleep hygiene
